I'm honored to be a member of the 4k1e_rda project.

Below, you'll find a brief summary of our project. To access a detailed project description, please go to https://emu-hacettepe-analytics.github.io/emu430-fall2023-team-4k1e_rda/

**Summary**

In this project an exploratory analysis of the types of crimes committed in Turkey between 2011 and 2020 is presented. Types of crimes are categorized by educational status in different time periods.
